```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Generate the DSC results:

```{r}
setwd("..")
system("dsc benchmark.dsc --replicate 20")
setwd("analysis")
```

Let's take a look at the DSC results using an interactive Shiny plot:

```{r}
library(dscr)
library(dscrutils)
dscout <- dscquery(dsc.outdir = "../benchmark",
                   targets    = c("simulate.scenario","analyze","score.err"))
dscr::shiny_plot(subset(dscout,score == "pred_err"),
				 "simulate.scenario","analyze")
dscr::shiny_plot(subset(dscout,score == "coef_err"),
				 "simulate.scenario","analyze")
```
